CustomField.description: For 'Buffer Window' agents, this sets the base number of recent messages to include in the history. The framework ensures the oldest turn included is never cut off, so the final count may slightly exceed this limit. A blank value includes all history; a value of 0 includes no history.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Only applies to Buffer Window agents. Enter the number of recent messages to remember (leave blank for unlimited, 0 for none). Complete conversation turns are preserved even if they exceed this limit.
CustomField.label: History Limit
